detail_desc: Running top in jersey with reflective details. Stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Single-breasted jacket in a striped cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Short, A-line skirt in washed denim with a raw-edge hem.
Metal and plastic earrings in various designs. Length from 0.5 to 6 cm.

Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped pocket on one sleeve, welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Elasticated, fabric-covered scrunchies.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Long-sleeved tops in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with a button placket and embroidered scalloped trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved shirt with a bow tie and waistcoat in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Waistcoat with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
Leggings in soft jersey with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, a back pocket and tapered legs.

Block-coloured trainers in imitation leather and imitation suede with a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Linings in mesh made from recycled polyester. Cotton twill insoles and patterned soles.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with appliqués. Zip fly and button and raw-edge hems.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a padded hood with a faux fur trim, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and elastication at the back of the waist. Handwarmer pockets with a flap and press-stud, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps, front and back pockets and slim legs.
Top in sturdy, printed cotton jersey with a double-layered drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in soft denim with a small stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Decorative pocket flaps with a press-stud at the top, and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, straight-cut maxi dress in airy, ribbed, heavily draping jersey with a V-neck front and back, and narrow tie-top shoulder straps. Unlined.

Handbag in grained imitation leather with metal details and a handle at the top, detachable shoulder strap with metal carabiner hooks and a wide tab with a magnetic fastener. One inner compartment with a press-stud. Contrasting colour inside. Size 13x23x31 cm.

Calf-length dress in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, chunky knit with a polo neck and low dropped shoulders.

Ankle boots in suede and leather with padding around the top of the shaft, lacing with speed hooks at the front and decorative welt seams around the soles. Faux fur linings, leather insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Slightly wider jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, open back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups with roll edges at the hems.

Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-shaped opening at the top and a collar with ties at the front. Pleat at the back, cuffs with a covered button, and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back. Wide elastic waistband.
Metal earrings in various designs with faceted sparkly stones. Size 0.8 cm, 3 cm and 9.5 cm.

Ankle-long trousers in imitation leather with a regular waist, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener and diagonal front pockets. Gently tapered legs with decorative seams down the front and at the knees.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Cardigan in a fine-knit cotton blend containing some wool. Ribbed collar, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Non-wired lace bras with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated hem. No fasteners.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
3/4-length leggings in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny, slightly shorter legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and modal blend with a high, ribbed collar, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Large pouch bag in crocodile-patterned leather with a zip at the top, wrist strap and small inner compartment. Size 0.5x16x23 cm.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend.
Short skirt in imitation leather with a high waist and a concealed zip at the back. Lined. The polyurethane content of the skirt is water-based and free from DMF.
Short shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Short, fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey made from recycled polyester. Round neckline with a narrow trim.
Brazilian briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in a pima cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pocket with a concealed button, concealed pockets in the side seams. and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.

Two-button jacket in woven fabric containing some wool with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Short, fitted one-shoulder dress in soft jersey with one long sleeve.
Fine-knit knee socks in a soft cotton blend with a high shaft that ends at the knee.
Knee-length jacket in a patterned viscose weave with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave in a narrow cut at the top with lace details. Lace and an open section at the back, and a hook and eye fastening at the back of the neck. Pleats at the top, a seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and wide legs. Unlined.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sunglasses with metal frames, sidepieces decorated with pearly plastic beads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Double-layered hat in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Playsuit in cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, a round neckline and press-studs at the back. Side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Set with a T-shirt and joggers. T-shirt in soft, printed jersey. Joggers in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Bikini. Fully lined bikini top with a decorative knot detail at the front and metal fastener at the back. Fully lined bikini bottoms.
Two pairs of shorts in soft cotton twill, one pair with an all-over print. Elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.
Calf-length dress in crinkled jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a smocked bodice with a frill trim at the top, and a softly draping, flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Short dress in patterned chiffon crêpe with a small stand-up collar and opening at the front with ties at the top. Short, flounced raglan sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a metal fastener at the front and an elasticated, lace-trimmed hem.

Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra. Top with a racer back, narrow shoulder straps and decorative, crossover straps at the back. Sports bra with an elasticated hem.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with long puff sleeves that are voluminous at the top in a cotton weave and narrow at the bottom in ribbed jersey.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Mittens in a soft rib-knit wool. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with a hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in a slightly longer style with patches on one sleeve and a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and, ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Gathered seam at the back and down the sleeves. Quilted lining.
Sports vest tops in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Cable-knit dog jumper containing some wool with a foldover collar and ribbing around the front legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, striped organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder (no press-studs in sizes 18M-4Y).

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
